#### LOAD LIBRARIES
```{r}
library(pacman)
p_load(tidyverse, BayesFactor, lmerTest, rms, parnsip, htmltools, bridgesampling, rstanarm)
```


```{r}

log <- read.table(file = "12.09.22_m1_v2_log.txt", header = FALSE)
View(log)
```

```{r}
#set variable names

log <- log %>% set_names(c("stimID", "GW", "GAL", "NGQ", "NGL", "jitter1", 
              "jitter2", "response", "outcome"))

log %>% glimpse
```
```{r}
log <- subset(response, practice != "0") # exlude 0s (no presses)

```

```{r}
RTs<-log %>% 
  group_by(response) %>% 
  summarise(mean = mean(n), sd(n)) 
```
